summary: Practicing international arbitration law at Youssef & Partners Attorneys, a Legal 500 (recognized as a "Leading Individual" in the Egypt 2020 ed.) and Chambers & Partners Band 1 rated law firm in Cairo (ranked Band 3 Attorney), and focused on international arbitration, appearing as lead counsel in several arbitration matters before the Cairo Regional Center for International Commercial Arbitration, as well as working closely with a number of global law firms as local co-counsel in matters before several arbitration fora including the International Center for Settlement of International Disputes, the International Chamber of Commerce – International Court of Arbitration, the Permanent Court of Arbitration, and Ad Hoc tribunals. I represent clients on matters ranging from international commercial arbitration, international business transactions, oil & gas (currently a Legal 500 Recommended Attorney), to corporate & commercial agreements, mergers & acquisitions. As a result of this local general practice, I am exposed to a wide range of legal issues and client-oriented practical commercial considerations. During the short period in Egypt, I have also taught at a local university teaching Egyptian business law and have a growing number of recent publications.
